echo site title
MASTELLO
Collect the offcanvase-nav links, forms, and other content for toggling add nav class and id's Home Menus Live Entertainment Home Private Events THE LOFT RESERVATIONS PRIVATE EVENTS About Us Contact Us ​about us Bay Street Yard is a truly unconventional and exciting concept, seamlessly merging historic with modern amenities to create a vibrant outdoor entertainment venue. Its utilization of shipping containers amongst the repurposed riverside warehouses of Downtown Fort Myers adds a unique industrial charm, while offering practical function. Each container has a distinct program – bar, restroom, refrigeration, storage – which collectively define spatial relationships across an open yard. The layout of the yard has a diverse range of areas such as a food truck alley, stage and Jumbotron, two bars and a variety of seating areas, including the  VIP upper deck, high-top drink rails, lounge chairs, and intermingled open spaces for dancing or playing games  with lush greenery throughout. The process to design a “not-building” was challenging to navigate to bring the vision to life. However, the perseverance and ingenuity of the creative team undoubtedly paid off, resulting in Downtown Fort Myers’ backyard garden. Bay Street Yard is more than just a venue; it’s a testament to the power of imagination and collaboration  in transforming a vacant urban space into a vibrant community hub.  Strike up the band, turn on the game, kick back, get down, do it however you like it. If the journey to get Bay Street Yard “built” is any guide, being a patron will be just as inspiring. close
closes
2136 Bay Street Fort Myers, FL 33901 (239) 940-8744 General seating is available on a first-come, first-served basis. VIP Loft reservations are required. 21+ after 9pm. echo site title
MASTELLO
Collect the offcanvase-nav links, forms, and other content for toggling add nav class and id's Home Menus Live Entertainment Home Private Events THE LOFT RESERVATIONS PRIVATE EVENTS About Us Contact Us Private Events​ Host Your Next Memorable Event at Bay Street Yard Looking to host a private event at our Downtown Fort Myers venue? For parties of 10 or more, complete the form linked below to book your private event, and our sales team will reach out to assist you. All inquiries will receive a response within 24 hours. Please note that general seating on the ground level is available on a first-come, first-served basis. To discuss your event needs in detail, please contact our Catering & Events Manager at (239) 940-8744 . PRIVATE EVENT REQUEST FORM PLATTER MENU From intimate family gatherings to lively wedding celebrations, Bay Street Yard is Fort Myers’ go-to destination for unforgettable social events. Our vibrant, outdoor venue offers a relaxed yet stylish atmosphere perfect for rehearsal dinners, birthday parties, engagement celebrations, reunions, and everything in between. With flexible spaces, local food and drink favorites, and an energetic vibe that captures the spirit of downtown Fort Myers, your event will feel both effortless and extraordinary. Let our team help you bring your vision to life—because every occasion deserves a great backdrop. close
closes
